data.name: Virizion-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Verdant Wind
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any Grass Energy attached to it can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Emerald Slash
attacks.text: You may search your deck for 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Bail Out
attacks.text: Put 2 Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Prize Count
attacks.text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Double Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Leaf Wallop
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Leaf Wallop does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Wrapped in Wind
attacks.text: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Double Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Leaf Wallop
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Leaf Wallop attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sacred Sword
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

data.name: Virizion-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Double Draw
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Sensitive Blade
attacks.text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Breeze Away-GX
attacks.text: Put any number of your Pokémon in play and all cards attached to them into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Virizion

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.text: Each of this Pokémon's attacks does 50 more damage to Darkness Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Leaf Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Bail Out
attacks.text: Put up to 2 Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

data.flavorText: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

data.name: Virizion V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Verdant Wind
abilities.text: Each of your Pokémon that has any Grass Energy attached to it can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Emerald Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

data.name: Virizion

attacks.name: Four as One
attacks.text: If Cobalion, Terrakion, and Keldeo are on your Bench, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: A legend tells of this Pokémon working together with Cobalion and Terrakion to protect the Pokémon of the Unova region.
